import styles from "./publication.module.css"; import Image from "react-bootstrap/Image"; import PostsData from "../feeds/postsData"; import FavoriteIcon from "@mui/icons-material/Favorite"; import CommentIcon from "@mui/icons-material/Comment"; import Comments from './Comments' const Publication = (props) => { return ( <>
{PostsData[0].postUser}

{PostsData[0].userJob}

{PostsData[0].relativeTime} ago

{PostsData[0].question}
{PostsData[0].article}
{PostsData[0].likesCounter} likes
{PostsData[0].commentsCounter} comments
); }; export default Publication;
